summary: A small fort with a simple house, blacksmith area, alchemy area and good storage. Made for medium performence computers. Dawnguard and Skyrim Update requiered
descriptionHtml:
29-03-2012 - Navmesh and changed some this in the bedroom.
30-03-2012 - Fixed some issues with the main gate.
                 Added a safe for scrolls to the house.

REQUIRES: 
Skyrim Update
Dawnguard

Delphine and the Blades built a small fort to cover their operations. Now their out fighting and gave you permission to use it. It is located just across the road of North Shriekwind Bastion, near the lake of the Lady Stone. (look in your map, it\'s there).

Inside the house, there are:
3 shrines (Akatosh, Arkay and Talos);
Storage for potions, notes, books, journals, armor (common and rare/unique), unique weapons, (...);
Blades armor and weapons;
Bed;
Food and drinks;
A nice and big dragon head.

In the blacksmith area, there are:
An anvil, 
A tanning rack, 
An armor workbench, 
A smelter, 
A sharpening wheel 
Storage.

In the alchemy area, there are:
An alchemy table;
Some storage;
A garden.

I\'m thinking of upload the fort with some Blade guards but it isn\'t complete yet.

My computer is not that good so I made this simple house to have a better time playing.
It\'s my first public mod, BTW :D
author: Valz Reznov
